abstracts.cdata!:
The main features of the program are:
            (a) the installation of a 3 MW diesel unit at Lilongwe which
            is required by the end of 1971 to avoid a power shortage in
            1972 prior to the commissioning of the Tedzani hydroelectric
            station; (b) the construction of the first stage (16MW) of a
            hydroelectric station at Tedzani Falls on the Shire river;
            (c) the training of ESCOM personnel; (d) construction of 66
            kv transmission lines, 4.5 miles from Tedzani Falls to Nkula
            Falls, 28 miles from Tedzani Falls to Blantyre, and 165
            miles from Nkula Falls to Lilongwe; (e) extensions and
            improvements to mains and substations; and (f) other items
            such as service line materials, meters, special transport
            equipment, office machines, required for general development.
